section.title: Setup from source
section.para: As Drools is an open source project, instructions for building from source are part of the manual ! Building from source means you can stay on top with the latest features. Whilst aspects of Drools are quite complicated, many users have found ways to become contributors.
Drools works with JDK1.5 and above. you will need also need to have the following tools installed. Minimum requirement version numbers provided.
